channel.title: Cyberdeck on Glinek
channel.description: Recent content in Cyberdeck on Glinek
channel.copyright: © 2024 Szymon Glinka | This website does NOT use any cookies for tracking.

item.title: Pelican Case workstation
item.description: This is a 15kg pelican case that houses lab bench power supply, ethernet switch, second screen, charger for my laptop and much more. Also It’s incredible durable thanks to using a gun hard case.

item.title: Obsium mk2
item.description: Obsium mk2 is an upgraded version of my beloved Obsium. New version comes with Raspberry Pi 5, 512GB SSD and much more. But those upgrades came at a cost of some functionalities of the previous version.

item.title: Obsium mk1
item.description: Cyberdecks serve a different purpose for everybody. Some create it purely for fun others try to make a perfect „laptop” like device to fulfil all of their needs. For me it is both.
